channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: What is the key to surviving a plane crash according to aviation experts?
item.description: Experts say a combination of training and technology were critical to all 76 passengers and four crew members surviving the fiery Delta Air Lines plane crash in Toronto.

item.title: Justice Department official urges quick dismissal of criminal case against New York City mayor
The white man who pleaded guilty to shooting a Black teen who rang a wrong doorbell dies
